episode_event_general_ch0089_00_n/6901_1: No way! HE came to Pasio?!
episode_event_general_ch0089_00_n/6902_1: So, this is where you wanted to bring us.
episode_event_general_ch0089_00_n/6903_1:
I’m positive! You’ve told me all about him, so I
knew exactly who it was!
The person I saw was definitely N!
Wow. So N is here on Pasio...
I haven’t seen him in so long.
You really want to see him again, don’t you.

Why don’t we go look for N? I’ll show you where
I saw him!

[Name:PlayerNickname ], why don’t you come
with us, too?
I wanna introduce you to my friend!
episode_event_general_ch0089_00_n/4201_1:
After all this time, I can
finally see him again,
here on Pasio...
There’s a lot of stuff I need to say to N!
